initial_story:
Police have deployed an armoured vehicle to pry open the cabin of a lorry on a motorway in Texas.

The driver refused to stop, or get out of the cab when officers used spike strips to stop the vehicle, police said.

After the armoured vehicle tore open a window, police threw in a gas canister, before going inside and pulling the driver out.

It is unclear what started the chase, but police said the driver used "evasive manoeuvres", changing lanes multiple times and swerving.

“We still don’t know why he was acting in the erratic manner that he was,” Harris County Sheriff Ed Gonzalez told journalists, adding that he appeared to have "some heavy impairment".
stories:
Firefighters have deployed a water cannon to extinguish a blaze engulfing a high-rise building in downtown Tokyo.

The residents refused to evacuate, or leave their apartments when firefighters used loudspeakers to alert them, authorities said.

After the water cannon blasted open a window, firefighters threw in a smoke-suppressing device, before going inside and guiding the residents out.

It is unclear what caused the fire, but officials said the residents used "desperate measures", frantically pressing every elevator button and running up and down the stairs.

"We still don't know why they were acting in such a frantic manner," Tokyo Fire Department Chief, Hiroshi Nakamura, told reporters, adding that it appeared they were unaware of the severity of the situation.

Emergency responders rushed to a flooded apartment complex in Miami, where residents were trapped in their units by rising waters. Despite repeated warnings and attempts to evacuate, many refused to leave, citing concerns about their belongings and pets. A rescue team used a specialized submersible to breach the windows of the submerged buildings, and then carefully extracted the stranded residents, some of whom were found huddled on furniture, surrounded by water. The cause of the flood remains under investigation, but officials suspect a combination of heavy rainfall and a faulty drainage system.

Firefighters battled a massive wildfire raging through a drought-stricken national park in California, where hikers were trapped on mountain trails by treacherous terrain and thick smoke. Despite repeated warnings and attempts to evacuate, many refused to leave, citing concerns about their gear and the prospect of losing their prized camping spots. A rescue team used a specialized helicopter to airlift the stranded hikers, some of whom were found huddled around campfires, surrounded by flames. The cause of the blaze remains under investigation, but officials suspect a combination of lightning strikes and human error.

Search and rescue teams combed the flood-ravaged city, where residents were trapped in inundated apartments and streets by treacherous waters and downed power lines. Despite repeated warnings and attempts to evacuate, many refused to leave, citing concerns about their belongings and the prospect of losing their homes. A rescue boat used a specialized winch to lift the stranded residents, some of whom were found clinging to roof tops, surrounded by debris. The cause of the deluge remains under investigation, but officials suspect a combination of heavy rainfall and infrastructure failure.

Firefighters battled the raging inferno, where residents were trapped in smoke-filled buildings and streets by collapsing walls and debris. Despite repeated warnings and attempts to evacuate, many refused to leave, citing concerns about their pets and the prospect of losing their livelihoods. A rescue team used a specialized ladder to lift the stranded residents, some of whom were found huddled in doorways, surrounded by the ruins of their homes. The cause of the blaze remains under investigation, but officials suspect a combination of faulty wiring and human error.
